scoringPlays.text: Winston Dimel 5 Yd Run (Matthew McCrane Kick)
Jesse Ertz 35 Yd Run (Matthew McCrane Kick)
Kendall Adams 30 Yd Interception Return (Matthew McCrane Kick)
Hasaan Klugh 19 Yd Run (Nigel Macauley Kick)
Kendall Adams 46 Yd Fumble Return (Matthew McCrane Kick)
Alex Barnes 4 Yd Run (Matthew McCrane Kick)
Dalvin Warmack 13 Yd Run (Matthew McCrane Kick)
Mike McCoy 15 Yd Run (Nick McLellan Kick)

videos.description: Winston Dimel runs the ball five yards to the end zone to put the Wildcats up 7-0 over Charlotte.
videos.headline: Dimel puts Kansas State on the board

videos.description: Wildcats RB Alex Barnes flies over a Charlotte defender with a timely leap.
videos.headline: K-State's Barnes hurdles a defender

videos.description: Kansas State's Kendall Adams returns 49ers QB Hasaan Klugh's pass 30 yards to the house as the Wildcats lead Charlotte 21-0.
videos.headline: Wildcats intercept Charlotte for pick-six

videos.description: 49ers QB Hasaan Klugh books it to the goal line and hurdles a Kansas State defender for the score in the first quarter.
videos.headline: Charlotte QB leaps into end zone

videos.description: Kansas State QB Jesse Ertz runs 35 yards for another Wildcats touch down in the first quarter.
videos.headline: Wildcats' Ertz stays elusive heading to the goal-line

videos.description: Kansas State's Kendall Adams scoops up the 49ers' loose ball and returns it to the end zone to extend the Wildcats' lead to 30-7.
videos.headline: Adams returns Charlotte's fumble 54 yards for TD

videos.description: Alex Barnes muscles through Charlotte's defense 4 yards to the goal line for the score to put Kansas State up 37-7.
videos.headline: K-State powers to end zone to cushion lead

videos.description: Dalvin Warmack hustles 13 yards in the third quarter for the TD, bringing the Wildcats' lead over the Charlotte 49ers 45-7.
videos.headline: K-State's Warmack stays on his feet into the end zone

videos.description: Kansas State's Mike McCoy bulldozes to the goal line, adding to the Wildcats' lead 55-7 over Charlotte.
videos.headline: Wildcats pile another TD onto lead
